      Method parameters in org.eclipse.jetty.client.api with type arguments of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Destination.newConnection​(Promise<Connection> promise)
      Creates asynchronously a new, unpooled, Connection that will be returned at a later time through the given Promise.
